mapper.update: MERGE INTO VISITOR V USING ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) AS VISITOR_DATE, #{clientIp} AS VISITOR_IP FROM DUAL ) D ON (V.VISITOR_DATE = D.VISITOR_DATE AND V.VISITOR_IP = D.VISITOR_IP) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET V.DAILY_VISITS = V.DAILY_VISITS + 1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (VISITOR_DATE, DAILY_VISITS, WEEK_GROUP, VISITOR_IP) VALUES (D.VISITOR_DATE, 1, TO_CHAR(D.VISITOR_DATE, 'YYYYWW'), D.VISITOR_IP)
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(VISITOR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VISITOR_DATE, NVL(DAILY_VISITS, 0) AS VISIT_COUNT FROM VISITOR WHERE VISITOR_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 6 ORDER BY VISITOR_DATE
SELECT NVL(SUM(DAILY_VISITS), 0) AS MONTHLY_VISITS FROM VISITOR WHERE TO_CHAR(VISITOR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM')

SELECT TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS payDate, SUM(PAY_AMOUNT) AS payAmount FROM PAYMENT_RECORD WHERE PAY_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 6 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT NVL(SUM(PAY_AMOUNT), 0) FROM PAYMENT_RECORD WHERE TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM')
